law.catch_line: Sales and use taxes are in addition to other taxes.
law.text: The taxes imposed by this chapter shall be in addition to any excise, license, privilege or other tax imposed under existing provisions of the Kentucky Revised Statutes, including KRS 279.200 and 279.530.
law.history: Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 5, Art. I, sec. 85, effective February 5, 1960.
